content.raw:
Also, even after setting `use_cache` to true, which means it does load the model from `~/gazebo`, it seems it’s not able to load the textures:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3038247860-Screenshot_from_2019-09-08_22-20-15.png)
I have the API key loaded, for all that matters. Manually trying to open the png images seem to not work as well, so I suppose the download is somehow failing?
content.html:
Also, even after setting use_cache to true, which means it does load the model from ~/gazebo, it seems it’s not able to load the textures:

I have the API key loaded, for all that matters. Manually trying to open the png images seem to not work as well, so I suppose the download is somehow failing?
